EmailTemplate.name: CSO - AOG Verbal
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Case.Subject} : {!Case.CaseNumber}, Tail # {!Case.Aircraft_Tail_Number__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Case Number: {!Case.CaseNumber}
Per our conversation, you have placed the following AOG order.
Please provide confirmation that below details are correct:
ACCOUNT INFORMATION: Company Name: Contact Name: Phone Number: Fax Number:
ORDER INFORMATION: Purchase Order #: Part/Product #: Quantity: Condition (New, Exchange): Price: Commit/Ship Date:
SHIP TO: Company Name: Contact Name: Customer Shipping Address:
BILL TO (if different than Ship To Address): Company Name: Contact Name: Customer Shipping Address:
SHIP VIA: Shipping Vendor: Account #: Shipping Method:
AOG DETAILS: A/C Type: A/C Serial #: A/C Tail #: Next Scheduled Flight: End User and Final Destination Required:
In order to help Honeywell comply with U.S. Export Regulations (Part 736 and 744), please provide the End User (EU) and Final Destination (FD) for the products you are purchasing, under this Purchase Order.
(U.S. Export Administration Regulations URL: http://www.access.gpo.gov/bis/ear/ear_data.html)
EU: __________________________________________________
FD: __________________________________________________
Honeywell AOG Team http://www.MyAerospace.com
ORIGINAL CORRESPONDENCE: {!Case.Subject} {!Case.Description}
